name: East Pittsburg Baptist Church
description: East Pittsburg Baptist Church is a Southern Baptist church located in London, Kentucky, affiliated with the Kentucky Baptist Convention. The church provides regular worship services, Bible study, and spiritual guidance to the community. As a member of the Southern Baptist Convention, the church follows Baptist beliefs and practices, offering Sunday worship services, Sunday School, and various ministry programs for all age groups. The church serves the London area and surrounding communities in Laurel County.
source: Verified from Kentucky Baptist Convention website and multiple online directories
hours: Sunday services and Bible study times vary, contact church for current schedule
notes: Mailing address: PO Box 237, London, KY 40743. Affiliated with Kentucky Baptist Convention and Southern Baptist Convention.
